quiz.details: You will be asked a random question. Reply with the correct option to earn points.

slot.details: Bet coins and spin the slots. Match symbols to win more coins.

rps.details: Challenge the bot by choosing rock, paper, or scissors.

truthordare.details: Get a fun prompt to answer truth or perform a dare.

joke.details: The bot will send a funny joke.

support.details: Get help, report bugs, or ask questions by joining the official support group for the bot.

count.details: Shows your total messages to the bot.

tid.details: Retrieve the current chat thread ID.

search.details: Ask the bot a question or query info.
